title: What does the Vision Pro case look like to you: a NASA-grade protective case or space marshmallow?
description: The Apple Vision Pro is the best consumer headset anyones ever made  and thats the problem.  Subscribe:  Like The Verge on Facebook:  Follow on Twitter:  Follow on Instagram:  Follow on TikTok:   The Vergecast Podcast:  Decoder with Nilay Patel:   More about our podcasts:   Read More:  Community guidelines:  Wallpapers from The Verge:   Subscribe to The Vergecast on YouTube, new episodes on Wednesday and Friday:
transcript: But I mean, look at this thing. It's like a little space marshmallow for your face computer For $200, on top of the $3,500 Vision Pro. This is obviously very silly. But there is something great about things that are this silly. And I just love it. It's all puffy. You know, it's. like NASA made it. You open it up. It's got little blinders for the Vison Pro. Put it to bed. Slide the Vision Pro in here. Push that forward to lock it down. Battery goes in here. Zip it up and put the cable in there. Comes with a little bag for accessories. I'm going to put the dual-loop band in there in case someone wants to wear that. Close it up. Zip it. And you're ready to rock.
